title: Chapter 8 - Isaac Sim for Robotics Development
description: NVIDIA Isaac Sim, built on the NVIDIA Omniverse platform, represents a new generation of robotics simulation. It's a powerful and highly realistic simulation environment designed to accelerate the development, testing, and deployment of AI-driven robots. Unlike traditional simulators that might focus solely on physics, Isaac Sim integrates high-fidelity graphics, sensor simulation, and advanced physics to create digital twins of real-world environments, enabling complex robotic tasks to be trained and validated in a virtual space.
